1.text: This is an account of the births of Adam: In the day of God’s preparing man, in the likeness of God He hath made him;

2.text: a male and a female He hath prepared them, and He blesseth them, and calleth their name Man, in the day of their being prepared.

3.text: And Adam liveth an hundred and thirty years, and begetteth a son in his likeness, according to his image, and calleth his name Seth.

4.text: And the days of Adam after his begetting Seth are eight hundred years, and he begetteth sons and daughters.

5.text: And all the days of Adam which he lived are nine hundred and thirty years, and he dieth.

6.text: And Seth liveth an hundred and five years, and begetteth Enos.

7.text: And Seth liveth after his begetting Enos eight hundred and seven years, and begetteth sons and daughters.

8.text: And all the days of Seth are nine hundred and twelve years, and he dieth.

9.text: And Enos liveth ninety years, and begetteth Cainan.

10.text: And Enos liveth after his begetting Cainan eight hundred and fifteen years, and begetteth sons and daughters.

11.text: And all the days of Enos are nine hundred and five years, and he dieth.

12.text: And Cainan liveth seventy years, and begetteth Mahalaleel.

13.text: And Cainan liveth after his begetting Mahalaleel eight hundred and forty years, and begetteth sons and daughters.

14.text: And all the days of Cainan are nine hundred and ten years, and he dieth.

15.text: And Mahalaleel liveth five and sixty years, and begetteth Jared.

16.text: And Mahalaleel liveth after his begetting Jared eight hundred and thirty years, and begetteth sons and daughters.

17.text: And all the days of Mahalaleel are eight hundred and ninety and five years, and he dieth.

18.text: And Jared liveth an hundred and sixty and two years, and begetteth Enoch.

19.text: And Jared liveth after his begetting Enoch eight hundred years, and begetteth sons and daughters.

20.text: And all the days of Jared are nine hundred and sixty and two years, and he dieth.

21.text: And Enoch liveth five and sixty years, and begetteth Methuselah.

22.text: And Enoch walketh habitually with God after his begetting Methuselah three hundred years, and begetteth sons and daughters.

23.text: And all the days of Enoch are three hundred and sixty and five years.

24.text: And Enoch walketh habitually with God, and he is not, for God hath taken him.

25.text: And Methuselah liveth an hundred and eighty and seven years, and begetteth Lamech.

26.text: And Methuselah liveth after his begetting Lamech seven hundred and eighty and two years, and begetteth sons and daughters.

27.text: And all the days of Methuselah are nine hundred and sixty and nine years, and he dieth.

28.text: And Lamech liveth an hundred and eighty and two years, and begetteth a son,

29.text: and calleth his name Noah, saying, ‘This one doth comfort us concerning our work, and concerning the labour of our hands, because of the ground which Jehovah hath cursed.’

30.text: And Lamech liveth after his begetting Noah five hundred and ninety and five years, and begetteth sons and daughters.

31.text: And all the days of Lamech are seven hundred and seventy and seven years, and he dieth.

32.text: And Noah is a son of five hundred years, and Noah begetteth Shem, Ham, and Japheth.
